content.text:
Mr. MENENDEZ. Mr. President, I was unavailable for rollcall 
vote No. 268, on the nomination of William L. Wehrum, of Delaware, to 
be an Assistant Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency. 
Had I been present, I would have voted nay.
  Mr. President, I was unavailable for rollcall vote No. 269, on the 
motion to invoke cloture on Derek Kan, of California, to be Under 
Secretary of Transportation for Policy. Had I been present, I would 
have voted nay.
content.speaker: Mr. MENENDEZ
